Next: Env.writeParams() Up: Env Previous: Env.setParam()


Env.start()

start ( )

Start an empty environment.

Example usage:

  env = Env(empty=True)
  env.setParam('ComputeServer', 'server.mydomain.com:61000')
  env.setParam('ServerPassword', 'mypassword')
  env.start()
